TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit IConventionTypeBaseBuilder implements class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.Builders.IConventionAnnotatableBuilder

summary.para: Provides a simple API surface for configuring an from conventions.
This interface is typically used by database providers (and other extensions). It is generally not used in application code.

Docs.remarks: See Model building conventions for more information and examples.

Docs.param: The or of the property.
Indicates whether the configuration was specified using a data annotation.
Docs.summary: Returns an object that can be used to configure the property with the given member info. If no matching property exists, then a new property will be added.
Docs.returns: An object that can be used to configure the property if it exists on the type, otherwise.
